meanings.definition: A room in a theater or studio where performers can relax before or after a performance.
meanings.sent1: The actors gathered in the greenrooms to prepare for their play.
meanings.sent2: After the show, the singers chatted in the greenrooms with smiles on their faces.
meanings.sent3: The comedian accidentally walked into the wrong greenrooms and ended up in the prop closet!
meanings.sent4: The greenrooms were like oases of calm amidst the chaos of the backstage.
meanings.sent5: The cozy greenrooms smelled of fresh flowers and anticipation.
